Name: Finding Fido: The Journey
About the game: Get ready to Jump into a fun little adventure that might just take you to big places! In Finding Fido: The Journey you're able to explore intricate environments filled with interesting characters to meet along your quest to save your dog! Finding Fido: The Journey is a Third Person Adventure game featuring: easy to Learn Controls and Interfaces fun Levels to Explore interesting Npcs to Interact With a story That's Simple to Engage In The only Content included in this free offering is the Finding Fido: The Journey Application. expect A Fun and Easy Going Journey! Finding Fido: The Journey is the first Steam released game from studio KanapaGames.
